station.title: Station Selection
station.description: Enter the NOAA station ID. All available sensors for this station will be created.

data_description.station_id: Enter the station ID (e.g., 9439040 for tides, 46029 for buoys)

error.invalid_station: Invalid station ID. Please check and try again.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to NOAA servers. Please try again later.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
